issue.title: [Rust] Implement array_ops::sum() for PrimitiveArray<T>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4155](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4155). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In array_ops we should implement sum() that will return Option<T::Native> for a PrimitiveArray<T>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4155?focusedCommentId=16735036) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3317
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3317>
